intro:
Even Cuter, Even Smarter!
A Brain-Training Puzzle Game to Boost Your Thinking Power
description:
A Brain-Boosting Spot-the-Difference Game with Cute Illustrations!

Can you find the one small mistake hidden in each adorable picture before time runs out?
This fun and simple brain-training game will test your observation and quick thinking!

How to play is super easy:

Look carefully at the image on the top of the screen.

Compare it with the one below to spot the difference.

Found it? Just tap the spot!

It might seem easy at first...
But with the timer ticking, even small differences can be tricky to catch!
Perfect for quick play sessions or a fun way to pass the time.

If you’re really stuck, there’s a hint button 
It'll quietly give you a clue about where to look (just don’t tell anyone).

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
